sentences.en: Any story matched with this seems uninteresting.
sentences.cn: 同这个故事相比,任何故事都显得索然无味.

sentences.en: But for Bob Sugg, that was too uninteresting a way of learning the news.
sentences.cn: 但是对于BobSugg来说, 这样获得消息太没意思了.

sentences.en: He found her uninteresting as a person.
sentences.cn: 他发现她是个很乏味的人.

sentences.en: He now seems gauche and uninteresting.
His lecture was so pedantic and uninteresting.
sentences.cn: 他的讲座学究气太浓，没意思。

sentences.en: I sat out the play last night tough it was quite uninteresting.
sentences.cn: 尽管昨晚的戏很无聊,但我还是坚持看到完.
我是个实际的, 乏味的人.

sentences.en: It was a long film and an uninteresting one to boot.
sentences.cn: 这是部冗长的影片,而且很乏味.

sentences.en: Lying in my hospital bed, I was a captive audience to these uninteresting old stories.
sentences.cn: 我躺在医院里只好听那些乏味的旧故事.

sentences.en: She is quite pretty, but uninteresting.
sentences.cn: 她的确很漂亮, 但并不讨人喜欢.

sentences.en: So many days are routine and uninteresting, especially in winter.
sentences.cn: 许多日子都过得平淡乏味，尤其是在冬天。

sentences.en: Their media has earned the reputation for being rather dull and uninteresting.
sentences.cn: 他们的媒体获得了相当单调、乏味的名声。

sentences.en: Their media have earned the reputation for being rather dull and uninteresting.
sentences.cn: 他们的媒体得到的名声是乏味无聊。

sentences.en: Their whole marriage life they had spent trying to encourage each other's uninteresting interest.
sentences.cn: 他们整个婚姻生活,都是在试图激励对方索然无味的兴趣中度过的.

sentences.en: This is an even more than unusually dull and uninteresting chapter.
sentences.cn: 这一章恐怕更加枯躁无味了.

sentences.en: Why did he choose these pale, nerveless, uninteresting people?
sentences.cn: 他为什么选了这么些脸色苍白、有气无力而又无聊乏味的人？

words.tran_cn: 无趣味的，乏味的；令人厌倦的

trans.tran_cn: 无趣的，令人厌倦的，平淡，枯，干燥
trans.tran_en: If you describe something or someone as uninteresting, you mean they have no special or exciting qualities
